titleStmt.title: Here begynneth the holy lyfe and history of saynt werburge very frutefull for all christen people to rede.
titleStmt.author: Bradshaw, Henry, d. 1513.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richarde Pynson, printer to the kynges noble grace, with priuilege to hym graunted by our souerayne lorde the kynge,

notesStmt.note: By Henry Bradshaw, whose name appears in the prologue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
